subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Inter Milan sprinted eight points clear at the top of Serie A with a 1-0 win over Lazio while Juventus's miserable form continued with a 2-1 loss at home to Catania.
snippet: Inter Milan sprinted eight points clear at the top of Serie A with a 1-0 win over Lazio while Juventus's miserable form continued with a 2-1 loss at home to Catania.
